front.title: Internet Draft Geoff Hart Category: Standards Track Western Governors University July 2014

abstract.t: CMLP is proposed as a tool System and Network Administrators can use torapidly identify maintenance work performed on local and remotenetworked hosts including routers, switches, servers, and firewalls aswell as other networked devices. The primary drivers for creationof CMLP are improving network availability and decreasing restoral timethrough rapid identifiation of change activity in the enterprise networkenvironment.
